translation.en: [creatures] True!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom ♪
Okay, here we go!
With Bartleby's skillful serve, Friendship Day slowball show down has begun!
translation.it: Con il servizio di Bartleby parte la sfida di palla rallentata!

translation.en: Oh, and True returns it with a stunning, spiral swoop!
translation.it: Vera risponde con un colpo a piroetta.

translation.en: Excellent elevation.
I got it!
Wait for it...
Keep waiting...
I call this the slow-mo slowball flip-flop tail-chop!
[laughs] Great moves, Bartleby!
Uh, where'd it go?
Okay... not a problem, I'll get the ball and stay completely dry while doing it.
translation.it: Nessun problema, prenderò la palla senza bagnarmi nemmeno.

translation.en: Come on, ball!
Come to Bartleby...
Sorry I grabbed your tail, B, but I thought it was an emergency.
translation.it: Scusa se ti ho preso per la coda, era un'emergenza.

translation.en: It was! I almost got wet!
But you would never let that happen, would you, True?
translation.it: Non lo avresti mai permesso, vero?

translation.en: Well... not on Friendship Day.
Ta-da! We're here to brighten your Friendship Day!
translation.it: Ta-da! Illuminerò il vostro giorno dell'amicizia!

translation.en: You brightened it alright. You got a dimmer switch on that thing?
translation.it: Altroché! Quel vestito va a batterie?

translation.en: Now that everyone's here, I have something to show you.
translation.it: Ora che siete tutti qui, ho qualcosa da mostrarvi.

translation.en: Come on!
So for Friendship Day, I made you all... friendship bracelets!
translation.it: Per il giorno dell'amicizia, vi ho fatto i braccialetti dell'amicizia!

translation.en: Presents?
Thanks, True! That's so thoughtful of you.
Cool! We're all matchy-matchy.
No one told me we give presents on Friendship Day. I would have got you all really good presents.
translation.it: Non sapevo che dovessimo farci dei regali. Vi avrei fatto dei regali carini.

translation.en: You don't have to. I just felt like making friendship bracelets for my friends.
translation.it: Non è un obbligo. Mi andava di farli per voi.

translation.en: And there are lots of different ways you can show you care on Friendship Day.
translation.it: Ci sono molti modi per mostrare il tuo affetto.

translation.en: Like baking nummleberry cookies to share! Want one?
translation.it: Come fare dei biscotti da condividere. Vuoi?

translation.en: Oh great, now we're sharing too.
And friends look after each other, like, um...
translation.it: Gli amici si aiutano tra loro,

translation.en: when True saved me from getting wet.
translation.it: come Vera che mi ha salvato dall'acqua.

translation.en: Here you go, Frookie.
But I didn't make gifts or bake cookies or save anyone.
translation.it: Ma non ho fatto regali né biscotti, né ho salvato nessuno.

translation.en: I didn't do anything nice!
translation.it: Non ho fatto niente di carino!

translation.en: When do I get to be nice?
Well, we couldn't have Friendship Day without you.
translation.it: Senza di te non sarebbe il giorno dell'amicizia.

translation.en: You were there for us when we needed you.
Well, I am really good at showing up.
translation.it: Sì, sono brava a farmi vedere.

translation.en: [Grizelda screams] A grippity-grab!
Get it off! [screams]
True, get it off me!
Okay, hold still and I'll grab it...
translation.it: Ok, stai ferma e lo prendo.

translation.en: Yikes!
Okay. Gimme a sec.
There's got to be a right way to remove a grippity-grab.
[Grizelda] Ooh! Hurry! Yikes! It's a grippity-grab snack attack!
Save the snacks!
Shoo! Shoo! Get off!
[gasps] Frookie! Look out!
A grippity is after your pretty neckerchief!
translation.it: Un granchio ti ruba il foulard!

translation.en: Hey! The grippities are taking all our fashion accessories!
translation.it: Ehi! I granchi rubano i nostri accessori!

translation.en: Since when do grippity-grabs care about style?
They don't. But they do like shiny things.
translation.it: No, sono attratti da ciò che luccica.

translation.en: In fact, legend has it there's a giant grippity-grab in the sea with a whole cave full of shiny treasure.
translation.it: Si dice ci sia un granchio gigante con una caverna piena di cose luccicanti.

translation.en: So if the grippity-grabs like shiny things...
translation.it: Allora, se amano tanto le cose luccicanti...

translation.en: Here little grippity, want this?
Problem solved!
[sighs] You saved me, True.
[gasps] You saved me! And you gave up your bracelet to do it!
translation.it: Mi hai salvata! E hai dato il braccialetto per farlo!

translation.en: You're such a great friend!
It's no big deal. I'm just glad you're okay.
translation.it: Non è niente. Sono felice che tu stia bene.

translation.en: I'm a great friend too. Just you wait and see!
translation.it: Sono anch'io una buona amica. Vedrai!

translation.en: I'm going to get your bracelet back.
Stop! Come back with True's bracelet!
[Bartleby] Yeah and my glasses!
Yeah, nummleberry cookies don't work so well as sunglasses.
translation.it: I biscotti non servono come occhiali.

translation.en: Mmm. But they taste great.
You come back here, you little grippities! You are ruining Friendship Day!
translation.it: Tornate qui! State rovinando il giorno dell'amicizia!

translation.en: Being a good friend is harder than I thought.
translation.it: È difficile essere una buona amica!

translation.en: I'll just make True a new, even better friendship bracelet.
translation.it: Le farò un braccialetto più bello.

translation.en: Out of extra special, super sparkly seashells, handpicked by me.
translation.it: Con queste belle conchiglie superluccicanti, raccolte da me.

translation.en: Patience, Frookie-kins. We'll play as soon as I'm done being thoughtful.
translation.it: Aspetta. Giocheremo quando avrò finito di essere gentile.

translation.en: Ta-da! All done. Isn't it irresistible?
translation.it: Ta-da! Ecco fatto. Non è irresistibile?

translation.en: Of course it is!
You must be that giant grippity-grab who collects shiny things.
translation.it: Sei il granchio gigante che raccoglie cose luccicanti.

translation.en: Look, I totally get liking pretty things,
translation.it: Capisco, amo anch'io le cose belle,

translation.en: but I'd like my bracelet back now please.
Hey! Give it back! [grunts]
That's not a toy, you know!
I made that for a friend.
What? No. Not you.
A princess can't be friends with someone so shellfish.
translation.it: Principesse e granchi non possono essere amici.

translation.en: No fair! I can't swim that far. I'm not some fish, you know.
translation.it: Non vale! Non so nuotare al largo. Non sono un pesce.

translation.en: What did you just do?
And why do my feet fell all floppy?
translation.it: E perché sento i miei piedi così mollicci?

translation.en: My perfect princess toes!
How am I supposed to try on new shoes?
I thought Grizelda would be back by now. Let's go find her.
translation.it: Grizelda dovrebbe essere già qui. Andiamo a cercarla.

translation.en: That shouldn't be too hard. Just follow that bright light.
translation.it: Non sarà difficile. Seguiamo la luce.

translation.en: -Um... that's the sun, Bartleby. -Oops.
Um, hi, Mr Sun! Happy Friendship Day!
We should be able to follow Grizelda's footprints in the sand.
translation.it: Seguiamo le sue orme sulla sabbia.

translation.en: Good idea, Zee. Let's go!
Give it back! [grunts]
This... day...
is... not... going like I planned.
Oops, sorry, Frookie. I'm not used to having a floppy fish tail.
translation.it: Scusa. Non sono abituata alla coda da sirena.

translation.en: Wait here, Frookie-kins.
I just have to catch Grippity, get my friendship bracelet, and make him turn me back into a whole princess
translation.it: Mi farò ridare il braccialetto e ritrasformare in principessa

translation.en: so I don't have to spend the rest of my life in the sea.
translation.it: così non dovrò vivere in mare.

translation.en: Bing, bing, boom! I'll be back soon.
Toodles!
Look at that shine...
it's Grizelda!
With a giant grippity-grab!
The legend is true!
Grizelda has a fish tail!
translation.it: Grizelda ha una coda da sirena!

translation.en: What happened, Frookie?
Isn't it obvious what happened?
translation.it: È ovvio! Preferisce passare il giorno dell'amicizia

translation.en: Grizelda would rather spend Friendship Day with a giant grippity than with us!
translation.it: È ovvio! Preferisce passare il giorno dell'amicizia con un granchio che con noi!

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie, we'll take care of you.
[sighs] Oh, the things we do for our friends. Yuck.
translation.it: Cosa non si fa per gli amici. Bleah.

translation.en: Grizelda would never leave Frookie behind.
Especially on Friendship Day.
I think Grizelda needs our help. We have to go and save her.
translation.it: Ha bisogno del nostro aiuto. E noi la salveremo.

translation.en: Wait, what? Like go in the water?
Yes, but since we haven't been turned into fish, we'll need Wish help!
translation.it: Sì, ma non siamo sirene e ci serve l'aiuto dei Desideri.

translation.en: Cumulo!
Come on, Frookie, you too.
To the Wishing Tree, please!
Happy Friendship Day to you too, Wishes!
But there's no time to chat, our friend needs our help!
translation.it: Non perdiamo tempo, aiutiamo i nostri amici!

translation.en: Right. Let's sit...
and have a think.
Okay, True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
Well, we think a giant grippity-grab turned Grizelda into a...
translation.it: Pensiamo che un granchio gigante abbia trasformato Grizelda in...

translation.en: ...an extra shiny fish-girl.
So I need a Wish to undo the spell and turn Grizelda back into herself.
translation.it: Mi serve un Desiderio per annullare l'incantesimo.

translation.en: And since Grizelda is under the sea, I need a Wish that will allow me to travel underwater.
translation.it: E dato che è nel mare, mi serve un Desiderio per andare sott'acqua.

translation.en: It's Friendship Day, we should all go and help. -[Frookie barks] -As long as I can stay completely dry.
translation.it: - È un giorno speciale, aiutiamola tutti. - Purché io resti asciutto.

translation.en: Alright.
I need a Wish that will take us all underwater.
translation.it: Serve un Desiderio che ci porti sott'acqua.

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
It is time to get your three Wishes.
I'm ready.
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.it: Albero dei Desideri, dona a me Desideri, un, due, tre!

translation.en: [True] ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
-♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ -Subba!
♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Un-Doo!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
translation.it: Le magie per me e per te

translation.en: Shim-Shim!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an inspiring combination of Wishes!
I can't wait to see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.it: Vediamo cosa ci dice la Desideropedia.

translation.en: So this is Subba.
-Hi, Subba! -[Subba chirps]
Subba is an underwater Wish. Subba gets big enough to fit all your friends inside and keep them dry.
translation.it: Può andare sottacqua. Potete starci tutti, e belli asciutti.

translation.en: Oh, I like him! Best Wish yet.
translation.it: Oh, mi piace! Un Desiderio favoloso!

translation.en: That's perfect! Subba will help us all travel underwater to find Grizelda.
translation.it: Perfetto! Subba ci farà viaggiare sott'acqua per trovare Grizelda.

translation.en: Your next Wish is... Un-Doo.
Well, hell-oo, Un-Doo.
Un-Doo!
[Zee] This is a reversing Wish. When it spins backwards over something, it undoes it.
translation.it: Girando all'indietro su qualcosa lo riporta com'era.

translation.en: But Un-Doo can only be used once.
translation.it: Ma si può usare solo una volta.

translation.en: If this Wish can turn Grizelda back into a two-legged princess,
translation.it: Se ridarà a Grizelda le sue due gambe,

translation.en: then Un-Doo only has to work once.
And your last wish is... Shim-Shim.
Shim-Shim has helped us once before.
It's a wish that's really good at wiggling.
Hello again, Shim-Shim! That... [giggles] tickles!
translation.it: È bello rivederti, Shakerino! Ahi, mi fa il solletico!

translation.en: I'm not sure how wiggling can help save Grizelda, but I'll think of something.
translation.it: Non so come potrà aiutarci con Grizelda, ma mi verrà in mente.

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.it: Zee, zip, zap, adesso entrate là.

translation.en: Now let's go get our friend Grizelda.
Thank you, Wishing Tree! Happy Friendship Day!
translation.it: Grazie, Albero dei Desideri. Buon giorno dell'Amicizia!

translation.en: How do fish swim with these floppy tails anyway?
translation.it: Come fanno i pesci a nuotare con queste code?

translation.en: -[grunts] -Excuse me, coming through.
You can't catch me! [gibbers]
You can't get away from me that easy, Grippity.
translation.it: Non ti libererai di me facilmente.

translation.en: This fish tail is supremely annoying.
Uh... thanks?
So you're giving me the bracelet back?
I guess not.
Poor little, Frookie.
You miss Grizelda, don't you?
But don't worry, we'll find her under all that water, won't we, True?
translation.it: Tranquillo, la troveremo anche sott'acqua. Giusto, Vera?

translation.en: You bet! Time for my first Wish!
translation.it: Certo! È l'ora del primo Desiderio.

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Subba, Wish come true!
translation.it: Svegliati, Subbus! Il Desiderio si avvera!

translation.en: Hi, Subba! We need to go under the sea to find Grizelda. Can you help us out?
translation.it: Ciao, Subbus! Grizelda è sott'acqua, ci aiuti a trovarla?

translation.en: Uh-huh! Subba!
All aboard!
[True] Okay, Subba, into the sea!
[True] Everybody keep an eye out for Grizelda.
She should be pretty easy to spot with that shiny tail.
translation.it: Non sarà difficile vedere la coda luccicante.

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I see it! Yeah, behind that rock!
Uh, that way, Subba.
Boom, boom!
Hmm, that's not her. It's a school of fish.
translation.it: Non è lei. Sono dei pesci.

translation.en: All those fish are wearing the same tail as Grizelda.
translation.it: Hanno la stessa coda di Grizelda.

translation.en: She is not gonna be happy with that.
Hey! How are we going to spot Grizelda if everything has a shiny tail?
translation.it: Ma come la vedremo, se tutti hanno la coda luccicante?

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie. Grizelda is down here somewhere. We'll find her.
translation.it: Tranquillo, Frookie. Grizelda è da queste parti. La troveremo.

translation.en: [Zee] But how? It's not as easy as following her tracks in the sand.
translation.it: Ma come? Non è come seguire orme sulla sabbia.

translation.en: Right, she can't leave footprints if she doesn't have feet.
translation.it: Già, non ha i piedi, non lascia orme.

translation.en: Grizelda may not be leaving tracks but Giant Grippity is!
translation.it: Lei non può lasciare orme, ma il granchio sì.

translation.en: [Zee] Good thinking, True!
Told ya, Frookie! True will find Grizelda in no time.
translation.it: Hai visto, Frookie? Presto troveremo Grizelda.

translation.en: [True] Okay, Subba, follow those tracks.
No fair! [grunts]
You know I can't walk out of the water into... [gasps]
[Grizelda] ...this amazing cave!
Your home is almost as nice as my palace.
translation.it: È bella quasi come il mio palazzo.

translation.en: So many pretty shiny things!
[gasps] Including me!
I'm not a half-fish,
translation.it: Non sono un mezzo pesce, ma una bellissima, alla moda,

translation.en: I'm an adorable, glamorous, unbelievably cute mermaid!
translation.it: Non sono un mezzo pesce, ma una bellissima, alla moda, adorabile sirena!

translation.en: If only my friends could see me now!
translation.it: Se i miei amici mi vedessero adesso!

translation.en: I miss them, you know, especially my best friend Frookie.
translation.it: Mi mancano, soprattutto il mio adorato Frookie.

translation.en: And Zee and Bartleby and True...
translation.it: E Zee, e Bartleby, e Vera...

translation.en: She's the one I made the beautiful bracelet for.
translation.it: È per lei che ho fatto quel bel bracciale.

translation.en: You know how it is with friends.
Oh! Maybe not.
Oh, thank you!
translation.it: Grazie! Lo darò a Vera per il giorno dell'amicizia,

translation.en: I have to give this to True for Friendship Day to show what an amazing friend I am.
translation.it: Grazie! Lo darò a Vera per il giorno dell'amicizia, così saprà che grande amica sono.

translation.en: Ooh, a pearl!
It's so beautiful.
I love shiny things. Wait a sec! Is this for me?
translation.it: Mi piacciono le cose che luccicano. Un momento. È per me?

translation.en: So you want to be friends?
Yeah, yeah! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
All that chasing and hiding was just playing?
translation.it: Quindi ti facevi inseguire solo per giocare?

translation.en: Well of course a princess and a grippity can be friends!
translation.it: Sì, principesse e granchi possono essere amici!

translation.en: We have so much in common...
We both love shiny things, we both have beautifully decorated homes.
translation.it: Amiamo le cose luccicanti, abbiamo case grandiose.

translation.en: [gasps] Next time you can come to my house!
translation.it: La prossima verrai tu da me!

translation.en: I'll have my Grizmos build us a waterpark and we can decorate it together! Won't that be fun?
translation.it: Farò costruire ai Grizmo un parco acquatico dove divertirci.

translation.en: After you turn me back into a princess of course!
[Grizelda] Oh, no!
Where's your magic thingy?
-[Grippity gasps] -[Grizelda] The clam has it!
Grippity, you have to get it out and change me back!
translation.it: Granchio, riprendila e fammi tornare com'ero.

translation.en: Oh no!
[grunts] Can you use your pincers to cut yourself free?
If only my friend True were here. She'd know what to do!
translation.it: Se Vera fosse qui saprebbe cosa fare!

translation.en: Maybe...
True!
Help!
[Grizelda] Help!
That way, Subba!
[Subba] Subba!
[Grizelda squeals] My Frookie-kins!
True, I knew you'd come find me.
translation.it: Vera, sapevo che mi avresti trovata.

translation.en: Wow! It is Grizelda.
And she really is a half-fish!
I'm not a half-fish, I'm a whole mermaid, thank you very much.
translation.it: Esatto, non un pesce, una sirena, grazie.

translation.en: Did the giant grippity do this to you?
Yes, but he can't turn me back.
translation.it: Sì, ma non riesce a ritrasformarmi.

translation.en: No problem! We'll undo his spell with my second Wish!
translation.it: Nessun problema! Useremo il secondo Desiderio!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
-Wake up, Un-Doo! -[gibbers excitedly]
Wish come true!
This Wish can reverse what Grippity did to you.
translation.it: Annullerà ciò che ti ha fatto il granchio.

translation.en: Really? So, you can use your Wish to undo what he did to himself?
translation.it: Davvero? Quindi puoi usarlo anche per aiutare lui?

translation.en: He was trying to help me and he got all tangled up.
translation.it: Cercava di aiutarmi e si è impigliato.

translation.en: He was trying to help you... like a friend?
Well... yes.
He really is my friend. A princess and a grippity can be friends, you know.
translation.it: È mio amico. Principesse e granchi possono essere amici.

translation.en: Grizelda, I can only use Un-Doo once.
translation.it: Grizelda, posso usare Indietro solo una volta.

translation.en: If Un-Doo frees Grippity, I don't have a Wish to turn you back.
translation.it: Se lo uso per lui, non potrò ritrasformarti.

translation.en: Then... [sighs]
...use the Wish to free Grippity.
[all] What?!
We're friends now.
And friends are always there for you when you need them. Right?
translation.it: E gli amici si aiutano, quando serve, no?

translation.en: But what about you?
Grippity is the one who really needs help. I'm fine.
translation.it: È a lui che serve aiuto. Io sto bene.

translation.en: Um, Grizelda? You may not have noticed, but you have a fish tail.
translation.it: Forse non l'hai notato, ma hai una coda da pesce.

translation.en: It's a mermaid tail! And being a mermaid isn't so bad.
translation.it: È una coda da sirena! Ed essere una sirena non è poi così male.

translation.en: But... you have to live in water!
translation.it: Ma dovrai vivere per sempre nell'acqua!

translation.en: Not a problem. I already have plans for a water park.
translation.it: Non importa. Costruirò un parco acquatico.

translation.en: And I could give Frookie swimming lessons.
-[barks] -[gasps] She did not mean that!
Grizelda, are you sure?
I'm sure. Let's do this.
Okay, Un-Doo, do your thing!
translation.it: Ok. Indietro, fai ciò che devi!

translation.en: [Un-Doo chirps excitedly] Un-Doo!
Yeah!
Good job, Un-Doo!
Nice work, Un-Doo. Now back in the pack.
translation.it: Bravo, Indietro! Ora a letto nello zainetto.

translation.en: I knew you could do it, True!
Thanks, B. Grizelda, that was very generous of you.
translation.it: Grazie. Grizelda, sei stata molto generosa.

translation.en: Are you sure you'll be okay being a half-fish... I-I-I mean mermaid?
translation.it: Sicura che starai bene, come pesce? Cioè, sirena?

translation.en: Well, it was nice having a super sparkly tail, and I was starting to get the hang of swimming.
translation.it: Mi sto abituando alla coda luccicante e non mi dispiace nuotare.

translation.en: But I do love my fancy shoes and running around with my little Frookie-kins.
translation.it: Ma adoro le mie scarpe e passeggiare con Frookie.

translation.en: Sorry, Grizelda. I don't think my last wish can turn you back into a princess.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. L'ultimo desiderio non potrà ritrasformarti.

translation.en: [Bartleby] What's Grippity doing? What's going on?
[Grizelda] Oh, Grippity's magic thingy is inside that clam.
translation.it: La sua bacchetta magica è lì dentro.

translation.en: His Trident? The same one he used to turn you into a mermaid?
translation.it: Il tridente che ha usato per farti sirena?

translation.en: [Grizelda] Of course!
But that clam clammed up and won't give it back.
translation.it: Ma la conchiglia non vuole ridarglielo.

translation.en: I think we can fix that.
Time for my third Wish.
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Shim-Shim! Wish come true!
translation.it: Sveglia, Shakerino! Il Desiderio si avvera!

translation.en: Shim-Shim the wiggle Wish? How will that help?
translation.it: Shakerino? Ma come ci potrà aiutare?

translation.en: Remember how Shim-Shim tickled my arm in the Wishing Tree?
translation.it: Ti ricordi che mi ha fatto il solletico?

translation.en: I bet a little tickle can get that grumpy clam to loosen up!
translation.it: Un po' di solletico aprirà quella conchiglia.

translation.en: Um, I still don't get it.
[laughs] That tickles!
See? You can't laugh with your mouth closed. Oh, my!
translation.it: - Per ridere apri la bocca. - Oh, cielo!

translation.en: So if the Clam laughs, it will open.
translation.it: Se la conchiglia riderà, si aprirà.

translation.en: Okay, Shim-Shim, wiggle away!
Shim-Shim makes the first move, the classic fast-slow-fast tickle.
translation.it: Shakerino fa la prima mossa. Veloce, piano, veloce.

translation.en: Oh! Clam blocks that move! There'll be no laughing today.
translation.it: La conchiglia lo blocca! Oggi niente risate!

translation.en: Shim-Shim is really upping her game.
[Bartleby] Clam is having a hard time ignoring the tickles.
Shim-Shim is tickling up, down and all around and shows no sign of stopping!
translation.it: Shakerino la solletica ovunque e non sembra volersi fermare!

translation.en: [Bartleby] Uh-oh, Clam can't take it and...
The clam is open, folks! The clam is open!
translation.it: Si è aperta, gente! Si è aperta!

translation.en: Now it's all up to Grippity to finish this. Here it comes!
translation.it: Ora tocca al granchio. Ecco che arriva!

translation.en: -[gibbers] -[Zee and Bartleby] Score!
You did it, Shim-Shim! Great job! Now back in the pack.
translation.it: Bravo, Shakerino! Ce l'hai fatta! A letto nello zainetto.

translation.en: Shim-Shim!
It's all up to Grippity now.
[gasps] I have legs again!
Thank you, Grippity. I knew you could do it.
translation.it: Grazie. Sapevo che ce l'avresti fatta.

translation.en: Good to have you back, Grizelda!
It's good to be back with all my friends.
translation.it: È bello riavere i miei amici.

translation.en: Now can we get back to celebrating Friendship Day up on the beach?
translation.it: Ora torniamo a festeggiare il giorno dell'amicizia?

translation.en: I'm still a little nervous under the sea. Just a second.
translation.it: - Stare sott'acqua mi agita. - Un attimo.

translation.en: Grippity?
For you, Grippity. You've earned it, my friend.
translation.it: Per te. Te lo sei guadagnato, amico mio.

translation.en: [True] Thanks for the great ride, Subba. Now back in the pack.
translation.it: Grazie per il passaggio, Subbus. Ora a letto nello zainetto.

translation.en: What a great Friendship Day! We all really stuck together like good friends do.
translation.it: Che gran giorno dell'amicizia! Sempre uniti, da veri amici!

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, okay, stop it.
[laughs] We're friends, I know.
translation.it: Siamo amici, lo so. Ora basta.

translation.en: I think the best thing is that Grizelda started a new tradition for Friendship Day.
translation.it: La cosa migliore è la tua nuova tradizione del giorno dell'amicizia.

translation.en: -[Grizelda] I did? -Ha!
Make a new friend!
Yep, I am pretty awesome!
[Bartleby] Oh, that is so Grizelda!
